queryMap: SPARQL '''PREFIX ordo: <http://www.orpha.net/ORDO/> select distinct ?disease where {?disease rdfs:subClassOf*  ordo:Orphanet_377788} LIMIT 1'''@START
SPARQL '''PREFIX ordo: <http://www.orpha.net/ORDO/> select distinct ?disease where {?disease rdfs:subClassOf*  ordo:Orphanet_377788} LIMIT 100'''@START
